description: Try our easy to follow Barbecue Prawns with Pear, Spinach, Blue Cheese & Pancetta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn dishes,High protein,Prawn,Quick & easy lunch,Spinach,Summer,Father's Day,Pear
name: Barbecue Prawns with Pear, Spinach, Blue Cheese & Pancetta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat barbecue hot plate on medium heat. Peel and devein large green prawns. Combine olive oil and crushed garlic cloves in a ceramic bowl and season with salt and pepper. Add prawns and toss to coat with marinade. Cover and stand for 20 minutes.
Thinly slice and cook pancetta on hotplate for 2 minutes each side. Transfer to a plate and when cold break into pieces.
Cook prawns on hotplate for 2-3 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Remove and place on a plate.
Quarter, core and slice pears. Empty fresh cuts baby spinach salad mix into a large bowl, add crumbled blue cheese, pear, pancetta and prawns.
Whisk extra virgin olive oil, white wine vinegar, caster sugar, salt and pepper in a jug. Add dressing to salad just before serving.
